name: street-view-node-mcp
description: A Model Context Protocol server for Google Street View API that enables AI models to fetch and display street view imagery and create virtual tours.
long_description: This extension provides comprehensive Google Street View capabilities through MCP tools. Fetch street view images by address, coordinates, or panorama ID, get metadata about locations, create HTML virtual tours, and manage saved images. Perfect for exploration, documentation, and virtual travel assistance.

tools.name: get_street_view
tools.description: Fetch a Street View image based on location, coordinates, or panorama ID and save to file

tools.name: get_metadata
tools.description: Fetch metadata about a Street View panorama including status, copyright, date, and coordinates

tools.name: create_html_page
tools.description: Create an HTML page that displays multiple Street View images as a virtual tour

tools.name: list_saved_images
tools.description: List all saved Street View images in the output directory

google_api_key.title: Google Maps API Key
google_api_key.description: Your Google Maps API key with Street View Static API enabled. Get this from https://console.cloud.google.com/
